com.rscja.deviceapi

Class BluetoothReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rscja.deviceapi.BluetoothReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBluetoothReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RFIDWithUHFBLE

    public class BluetoothReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBluetoothReader
    蓝牙读写器操作类：
    Bluetoot reader operation 第一步：调用init(Context context) 函数初始化蓝牙相关服务，退出应用程序需要调用free()是否蓝牙相关资源
    First step: Call init(Context context)to initiate BT service, call free() to exit application. 第二步：调用connect(java.lang.String, com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces.ConnectionStatusCallback<java.lang.Object>)连接蓝牙，在此之前你可以调用startScanBTDevices(com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces.ScanBTCallback)搜索附件的符合要求的蓝牙设备
    Second step: call connect(java.lang.String, com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces.ConnectionStatusCallback<java.lang.Object>) to connect BT, user could call startScanBTDevices(com.rscja.deviceapi.interfaces.ScanBTCallback) to search BT device nearby before connecting.

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBluetoothVersion()

        Specified by:
        getBluetoothVersion in interface IBluetoothReader
        Returns:
        key:IBluetoothReader.VERSION_BT_FIRMWARE 表示固件版本(Firmware Version), key:IBluetoothReader.VERSION_BT_HARDWARE 表示硬件版本(Hardware version) ， key:IBluetoothReader.VERSION_BT_SOFTWARE 表示软件版本(software version)
